results.definition: given to expressing yourself freely or insistently
a short musical composition with words
music intended to be performed by one or more singers, usually with instrumental accompaniment
full of the sound of voices
examples: a playground vocal with the shouts and laughter of children

results.definition: relating to or designed for or using the singing voice
examples: organized a vocal group to sing his compositions

results.definition: having or using the power to produce speech or sound
examples: all vocal beings hymned their praise
